physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. A single set of railroad is visible from the photograph. A train is travelling on that railroad. The words
 \\Eastern \u0026 Oriental Express\\
subject_terms_1:is displayed at its side in capital letters. There is a straight row of windows above the words. At the extreme mid-right of the image trains (vehicle groupings) passenger cars (railroad cars) travellers
subject_terms_2:there are three travellers standing by an open window and looking outwards. One of them seem to be holding a camera or a video recorder. There are trees in the background and no buildings are visible.\ Railroads Travellers Eastern and Oriental Express (Express train) Railroad trains
